privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Manage your privacy and security settings

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: Configure how your content is organized

defaultBin.title: Default Bin
defaultBin.description: Choose where new thoughtmarks are saved by default

analytics.title: Share Anonymous Analytics
analytics.description: Help improve the app by sharing anonymized usage data with differential privacy protections (ε=0.1, k≥5)

export.title: Export My Data
export.description: Request a copy of all your data with hashed identifiers only

success.title: Export Requested
success.message: Your data export has been requested. You'll be notified when it's ready to download (usually within a few minutes).

error.requestFailed: Failed to request data export. Please try again.
error.downloadFailed: Failed to download export file. Please try again.

deletion.title: Delete My Data
deletion.description: Request permanent deletion of all your analytics and usage data
deletion.sla: Data will be deleted within 30 days

confirmation.title: Confirm Data Deletion
confirmation.message:
This will permanently delete all your analytics data, experiment assignments, and usage metrics. This action cannot be undone.

Your thoughtmarks and account will NOT be affected - only analytics data will be deleted.

Deletion will be completed within 30 days per GDPR/CCPA requirements.

success.title: Deletion Requested
success.message:
Your data deletion request has been submitted. All analytics and usage data will be permanently deleted within 30 days.

You will receive a confirmation email when the deletion is complete.

error.requestFailed: Failed to request data deletion. Please try again.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: How we protect and handle your data

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing Notice
dataProcessing.description: Detailed information about how we process your data
